website_summaries.verdict: This unique piece is sure to get a lot of compliments.
pros: The chandelier has a great rustic look and provides plenty of light with its nine bulbs
The copper pipes have a great color and are easily adjustable
Fits nine 60-watt bulbs and is dimmer compatible
cons: Some customers had defective sockets that were quickly replaced by the manufacturer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fixture!
customer_reviews.text: Very unique light fixture. I wasn't expecting the painted-on copper finish since it wasn't clear from the photos, but WOW what a nice surprise! It came packed well and was easy to assemble. Caution: it will take some effort to hang to your ceiling bracket. The design of the hanging assembly of this lamp is not easy to work with (and I consider myself very handy). However, it is worth the effort... looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Selleck's Mustache

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of this product in July and did not begin install until October. The outdoor patio had to be built first. After putting the chandeliers together and adding bulbs, we found that with the slant of the roof, they would hang too low. Following a few emails back and forth with the company, we decided that a piece like those used to make the fixture, rather than the intended long piece at the top, would work best. They sent us the pieces quickly and free of charge. The chandeliers look very nice. I put in vintage bulbs and the industrial style is great for outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Maizey1210

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: It will probably be a month before this one is hung so I can't tell you that it works, but it does look great. The young teen who put it together was a little disturbed that the black "things" (my word not his!) are of the "cheap variety." They actually are (plastic), but this will be hung high, and I like that they are black so they do not bother me at all. The rest of the fixture is of heavy pipe, and the entire thing looks just as it does in the picture. It it works when we install, and I will think it is a home run!!
customer_reviews.author: Brinson Descendant

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Unique Fixture
customer_reviews.text: I gasped when my husband finished installing this chandelier because it was so dang gorgeous. I've included pictures with both the light on and off, but the pictures here don't do it justice. In real life it looks larger, and it is such a gorgeous focal point. It took my husband about 30 minutes to install. He's not an electrician, but he's handier than most, so I can imagine installation might take an average Joe more time. I'd say the end result is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Clockworks Village

customer_reviews.title: Don't Purchase
customer_reviews.text: After paying someone to install the light fixture, I discovered that one of the sockets does not work. I have tried different bulbs but to no avail. Now, I have the option of paying someone to take down, return it, and replace it or have an electrician come out to see what the problem is. As you would agree, neither option is optimal since I will incur more costs.
customer_reviews.author: gregory

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this light fixture! It was a pain putting together but well worth the work. I get so many compliments and friends have guessed I paid in excess of $900 for it!
customer_reviews.author: aged hippie

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: The color is a coppery and just what we were looking for. It warms up the fairly dark area over our table with our wood walls. Others have said there were electrical issues but everything worked perfectly on ours. We would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is the perfect industrial chic touch
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier makes a STATEMENT in my new loft! it is the perfect industrial chic touch, and looks like it could have come from Restoration Hardware
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: We love this light
customer_reviews.text: We love this light. We spray painted it and hung it in our salon. We get a ton of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing looking chandelier for any steampunk influenced decor
customer_reviews.text: Amazing looking chandelier for any steampunk influenced decor. Initially the first one I ordered was defective,but the seller sent me another one asap. Finish is an antiqued bronze . Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Avalos

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Many compliments
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Many compliments. People thinks it was made in a fabrication shop. Looks like real pipe and pipe fittings.
customer_reviews.author: Daddyxs4

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This couldn't look better with the decor of my home. It is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Conversation piece
customer_reviews.text: This is simple beautiful! My kitchen and dining room are Farmhouse decor this is icing on the cake! I’ve had so many compliments about it. It lights up my dining area so well! I’m so glad I went with it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS LIGHT !
customer_reviews.text: Great light fixture! I had a couple questions about the assembly instructions and their customer service person was quick to respond, friendly and knowledgable. I would definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our bar room and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 people to install...
customer_reviews.text: Well packed. Generally good quality. You might need to go to the hardware store and get some longer screws for mounting. The ceiling mounting could have been designed a little better. A partner to help makes the process smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great light fixture
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so pleased with this gift. She said it was easy for her to install.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rustic light
customer_reviews.text: Instillation wasn't too bad. It took my husband about an hour. It's fits very well with our decor. It's nice that you can move the pipes to your liking. It's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Lantvit

customer_reviews.title: Think outside the box.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t install them like the picture but I love this piece. It’s like industrial art. I’m obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal A.

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that it is adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is adjustable, or I guess changeable would be a better word. It looks great, however some parts are not quite square, so if you are a perfectionist be aware. It's not horrible, but fussy eyes won't miss it. I however love that it's a little off!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Eye catcher
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves this light. I'm going to change the color up a bit, but its very eyecatching and unique.
customer_reviews.author: el

customer_reviews.title: Manly Light
customer_reviews.text: Great looking fixture for the foyer of my man cave. Lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: IslandGuy

customer_reviews.title: Product came in a broken box and one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a broken box and one of the outlets does not work as it is missing the light bulb connector.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Pipe Chandelier gives dining room a rustic look.
customer_reviews.text: Just had this light installed yesterday. Love the rustic look. It's on a dimmer which makes this even better!
customer_reviews.author: Judy E. Held

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful light and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light, solid construction, excellent customer service. We are working with 18' high ceilings and needed extta chain. No problem, they happily sent us the extra that we needed. The only thing that wasn't fantastic was that islt was a slightly different colour than I was expecting. It is quite gold coloured, while I was looking for something more grey coloured, like iron. Not a big deal, I just bought metal spray paint and ta-da! Exactly what I wanted. This is fantastic light that really stands out. We have 60w edison bulbs in there and it lights up our kitchen and living room with a gorgeous warm light. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some holes didn't line up well, so installation took longer than expected. Very striking fixture though. Many, many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Sorry Goldy Look!
customer_reviews.text: Photos are very, very deceiving. Gold spray paint is not the industrial look. Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: SandyGeez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. The Edison lights actually give off quite a bit of light. It's classy but edgy.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Yetter Jones

customer_reviews.title: We loved the look of this light but unfortunately something was ...
customer_reviews.text: We loved the look of this light but unfortunately something was wrong with the wiring because we could not get it to light. We had painted it black to match our decor before we went to hang it, so we weren't able to return it. Sadly, this was a big loss for us.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Love the light!! My dining area was a dark corner and it's not anymore! Heavy duty and great quality. The only negative was the anchor bolts were not long enough, but this was easily corrected.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit difficult to get things to line up but its a decent product
customer_reviews.author: F K

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this product. The poor gold spray paint looks very cheap and extremely DIY. Also, it's far smaller than it appears in the pictures. I hope to be able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J. Posthuma

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Super hip and cool but my friend changed his mind and sent back. I like the look and would recommend this product, good quality and looks amazing. Great service from the seller on the return.
customer_reviews.author: lastar

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We love this light! It would fit well in either a modern industrial space or a rustic cabin.We have the rustic cabin look. Great service and packaging!
customer_reviews.author: customername

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: looks great over my dining table I have log furniture in my kitchen one of a kind
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl H

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite items in my home
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite items in my home. My friends and family love it and tell me every time they see it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super cool, versatile light fixture. easy to assemble and looks great in my foyer with my rustic/industrial theme!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This light is beautiful, exactly what we wanted. We get many compliments on this unique fixture! More importantly, the customer service was beyond compare. We needed additional cord and chain to hang from a vaulted ceiling, and SOEL graciously sent us both. Great product and great company! HIGHLY RECOMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SEOL-LIGHT Barn Adjustable Pipe Chandeliers Pendant Hanging Lighting with 9 Sockets(Industrial-Style)Max 540W Metal Iron For Dinning Room,Kitchen,Foyer
product_meta.description:
Only buy this item from Seol.If you buy it from other seller,we do not guarantee the quality.Thank you for your understanding.

Hot Item!This chandelier is more than a light fixture,it is also a great choice for home decor.Coopery with black painted finish,make your space stylish now! 
If you are keen on our product,welcome to click our brand"SEOL LIGHT"for more light fixtures. 

Style:Vintage/Industrial/Traditional/Unique 
Lamp Body Size:30*32 inches,Hang from a 31.5 inches'chain.The maximal height of this fixture is 65 inches when fully assembled.And the chain is adjustable,you can make it shorter. 
Color:Copper with Black Painted Finish 
Light material:Metal 
Bulb Base:E26 
Number of lights :9 
Suitable wattage:60W x9 
Bulb Included or Not:Bulbs Not Included 
Applicable Bulb Type:Edison, Incandescent,CFLs and LED bulbs.LED bulb is highly recommended
Dimmable: If use edison bulbs, incandescent bulbs or dimmable LED bulbs, this fixture is dimmable. 
Ceiling type:Hang from chain,Suitable for Flat Ceiling or Slope Ceiling
Voltage:110-120V
Package:All accessories and an English installation instructions included 
Suggestion:We suggest installation by a licensed electrician 
Suggested Room Fit:Dining Room, Living Room,kitchen,study,foyer 

Provided by Seol Light.All products in factory have to undergo a rigorous safety monitoring,we contribute to best quality product. 
If the light is damaged when you receive the goods,do not hesitate to contact us by message.Plz also contact us if you want further information about the product.We will reply you within 24 hours 
Get ready to make your life stylish!
